website_summaries.verdict: You'd have a difficult time finding a cork yoga mat that offers better construction or quality for a lower price.
pros: Made from natural cork and rubber

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality Cork Yoga Mat
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality cork yoga mat! This is the best yoga mat I have ever used. The cork provides excellent grip for sweaty hands. It truly is a non-slip yoga mat. The yoga mat strap is very convenient for travel and the thick padding is comfortable on my knees when I'm in child's pose. Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It truly is non slip
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried several “non slip” mats. All lies! Lol. This is the first mat where it’s as advertised. The sweatier your get, the more it grips. Anyway, I’m very happy with it and I’m not slipping off the mat injuring myself. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Karustis

customer_reviews.title: No Slipping
customer_reviews.text: Use the cork mat for both regular and hot yoga with absolutely no slipping. I do not enough use anything else (e.g. towel to cover the mat) during hot yoga. In addition, the mat is thick enough to provide enough padding for my bony knees. Great investment
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Salas

customer_reviews.title: Good padding, good traction
customer_reviews.text: Good padding, good traction. Right out of the box i noticed pieces missing and was able to see through the thin layer of cork to the mesh backing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase. More than anything, I like the feel. It doesn't have much cushion, but yoga is hardly a high impact workout. A little bigger than average, which is good. This is everything I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Yoga
customer_reviews.text: The mat is not slippery at all and it has enough padding to perform asanas like headstand comfortably. The strap makes it easy to transport. Best yoga mat I have had so far.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Gstoettenmayr

customer_reviews.title: Slick
customer_reviews.text: Bought to help me not slide, did not work. Perfectly okay mat.
customer_reviews.author: JD Ford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great yoga mat! Love the cork and there's no smell like other mats tbat I've had. Good padding .
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: It’s my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I’ve have several mats and this is my favorite of them all.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality mat
customer_reviews.text: Overall I love this mat. I get questions about the cork often. It definitely helps with minimizing sliding. It’s on the heavier side but I am not lugging it everywhere. Strap slides off sort of too easy. Hard to clean. I have dark spots where my hands and feet often are and I can’t get rid of that.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Overall good product. Not as thick as I wanted but still comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Bmmohio

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Waaaaay too heavy feels good when used but cork falls off if bent instead of rolled...chopped it in half since it was breaking anyway and now i got two good kitchen mats for cooking and washing dishes 😀
customer_reviews.author: Dang

product_meta.title: Mantra Cork Yoga Mat - Best Yoga Mat for Non Slip Grip - Thick Yoga Mat with Yoga Mat Strap - 72" x 24"x 5mm -100% Natural Cork Mat - Eco-Friendly Non-Toxic Natural Rubber Padding (Teal Strap)
product_meta.description: ALL NATURAL CORK - A healthy lifestyle starts with a healthy yoga mat. The Mantra™ Cork Yoga Mat is made from a unique blend of plant based cork and all natural rubber. Breathe easy knowing that your yoga mat is made from non-toxic, environmentally safe materials. The Mantra Cork Yoga Mat is 72" long x 24" wide with 5mm thick rubber padding.
feature_bullets: ALL NATURAL CORK - A healthy lifestyle starts with a healthy yoga mat. The Mantra™ Cork Yoga Mat is made from a unique blend of plant based cork and all natural rubber. Breathe easy knowing that your yoga mat is made from non-toxic, environmentally safe materials.

PREVENTS BACTERIA, MOLD, AND ODORS - The Mantra™ Cork Yoga Mat features antimicrobial, self-sanitizing cork. This unique blend of cork prevents bacteria, mold, mildew, and unwanted odors and smells from growing on your yoga mat. Whether you use your yoga mat on a daily basis or for occasional yoga sessions, this yoga mat is built to last!

SUPERIOR DESIGN - The Mantra™ Cork Yoga Mat comes with a convenient carrying strap for yoga on-the-go. The extra thick rubber padding and non-slip cork surface provide incredible support throughout any pose or exercise. The Mantra Cork Yoga Mat is 72" long x 24" wide with 5mm thick rubber padding.

NON SLIP GRIP - Traditional yoga mats lose their grip when you sweat, causing you to become unbalanced during your yoga session. The Mantra™ yoga mat features a unique blend of cork for optimal gripping power. The sweatier you get, the more grip you have. Spritz water across the top of your yoga mat for a premium, non-slip workout.

HOT YOGA, BIKRAM, PILATES - Mantra™ Yoga Mats are perfect for a variety of activities. Use the Mantra™ Cork Yoga Mat for any type of yoga - bikram, hot yoga, fitness classes, pilates, and more. The Mantra™ Yoga Mat works great indoors and outdoors. Practice at the park, beach, gym, studio, or in your home. The Mantra™ Yoga Mat fits your busy, on-the-go lifestyle!
